scripts.build: npm run clean-app && browserify ./app/scripts/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t browserify-ngannotate -o ./app/bundle.js
scripts.watch: npm run clean-app && watchify ./app/scripts/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t browserify-ngannotate -v -d -o ./app/bundle.js
scripts.clean: npm run clean-app & npm run clean-doc
